# Draft:Christopher Barnard Award

----
The Christopher Barnard Award is an academic prize awarded each year to a new investigator in acknowledgement of their research in the field of animal behaviour, and whose work will shape the future of our discipline. The award takes the form of a research grant of £1000 and the recipient is asked to give a keynote talk about their work at the Easter Meeting.

* 2024 - Nobuaki Mizumoto
* 2023 - David Fisher
* 2022 - Lucy Aplin
